option.name: ARC Core Version
option.tip: Specify the target ARC processor

option.name: ARC 5 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 5 core for which to generate code

option.name: ARC 600 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 600 core for which to generate code

option.name: ARC 700 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 700 core for which to generate code

option.name: Use STLPort C++ Library (-Hstl)
option.tip: Add header file directories for the STLPort C++ Library; also sets the linker option.

option.name: Common extensions (-Xlib)
option.tip: Specify standard set of extensions

option.name: Barrel shifter (-Xbs)
option.tip: Enable barrel shifter

option.name: Shift Assist (-Xsa)
option.tip: Enable shift assist

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmult32)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer multiply instruction

option.name: mult32 machine cycles (-Xmult32_cycles=)
option.tip: Specify the number of machine cycles that the mult32 instruction requires (for instruction scheduling purposes)

option.name: 16-by-16-bit multiply(-Xmpy16)
option.tip: Enable the 16-bit by 16-bit integer multiply that produces a 32-bit result.

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmpy)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer multiply instruction

option.name: Integer divide (-Xdiv_rem)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer divide instruction.

option.name: Normalize instruction (-Xnorm)
option.tip: Add support for the "norm" instruction

option.name: Bit scan instructions (-Xbitscan)
option.tip: Add support for the "norm", "ffs", and "fls" instructions

option.name: Swap instruction (-Xswap)
option.tip: Add support for the "swap" instruction

option.name: Code density extension (-Xcd)
option.tip: Enable instructions for improving code density.

option.name: Atomic option (-Xatomic)
option.tip: Enable the atomic option.

option.name: Use Timer 0 (-Xtimer0)
option.tip: Indicate that timer 0 is to be supported

option.name: Use timer 1 (-Xtimer1)
option.tip: Indicate that timer 0 is to be supported

option.name: Reduced register set (-rf16)
option.tip: Restrict register set to 16 registers

option.name: Extended arithmetic (-Xea)
option.tip: Add support for the "ea" instuction

option.name: Dual viterbi butterfly (-Xdvbf)
option.tip: Add support for the "dvbf" instruction

option.name: Variable polynomial CRC (-Xcrc)
option.tip: Add support for the "crc" instruction

option.name: 32x16 multiply instructions (-Xmul32x16)
option.tip: Add support for 32x16 multiply DSP instruction

option.name: 24x24 XMAC (-Xxmac_24)
option.tip: Add support for 24x24 XMAC DSP instruction

option.name: Dual 16x16 XMAC (-Xxmac_d16)
option.tip: Add support for dual 16x16 XMAC DSP instruction

option.name: Dual 32x16 multiply-accumulate (-Xdmulpf) [requires XY memory]
option.tip: Add support for dual floating point 32x16 multiiply-accumulate DSP instruction; requires XY memory

option.name: Harvard memory convention (-Hharvard)
option.tip: Assume code and data are separate address spaces

option.name: Memory Model
option.tip: Specify defaults in regard to what functions are "near" and "far"

option.name: Bypass cache to reference volatile variables
option.tip: Indicate whether or not the data cache is to be bypassed to reference "volatile" variables

option.name: Map uncached data into .ucdata section
option.tip: Map all uncached data into its own control section

option.name: Position-independent code (-Hpictable)
option.tip: Generate position independent code

option.name: Small-data section
option.tip: Specify the state of the small-data section

option.name: Compact Single-precision floating point (-Xspfp_compact)
option.tip: Generate extension instructions for compact single-precision floating point

option.name: Fast Single-precision floating point (-Xspfp_fast)
option.tip: Generate extension instructions for fast single-precision floating point

option.name: Compact Double-precision floating point (-Xdpfp_compact)
option.tip: Generate extension instructions for compact double-precision floating point

option.name: Fast Double-precision floating point (-Xdpfp_fast)
option.tip: Generate extension instructions for fast double-precision floating point

option.name: XY Memory (-Xxy)
option.tip: Specify whether or not XY memory is available

option.name: Code contains or will use overlays (-Haom)
option.tip: Indicate that code containing overlays, or using overlays, may be present.

option.name: AOM code subject to multi-tasking (-Hon=aom_rtos_aware)
option.tip: Indicate that AOM code is subject to multi-tasking.

option.name: Require that all code reside in overlays (-Haom_overlay_only)
option.tip: Require that the generated code contain overlays only.

option.name: Minimum pad bytes between overlays (-Hmin_overlay_set_pad)
option.tip: The minimum number of bytes that are to pad each overlay.

option.name: Enable MX Support (-Xsimd) [ARC700 only]
option.tip: Target processor is an ARC700 that supports MX SIMD instructions

option.name: Add VRaptor Support (-Xvraptor)
option.tip: Target processor is an ARC700 that supports VRaptor SIMD instructions

option.name: LP_COUNT register width (-Hlpc_width=)
option.tip: Width of the LP_COUNT register, in bits.

option.name: PC register width (-Hpc_width=)
option.tip: Width of the PC register, in bits.

option.name: ARC Core Version
option.tip: Specify the target ARC processor

option.name: ARC 5 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 5 core for which to generate code

option.name: ARC 600 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 600 core for which to generate code

option.name: ARC 700 Core
option.tip: Specify the ARC 700 core for which to generate code

option.name: Allow C-style escapes in strings
option.tip: Specify whether or not C-style escape processing is to occur in quoted strings

option.name: Use unsigned math for integer expressions
option.tip: Specify whether or not to use unsigned operation in integer expressions

option.name: Common extensions (-Xlib)
option.tip: Specify standard set of extensions

option.name: Barrel shifter (-Xbs)
option.tip: Enable barrel shifter

option.name: Shift Assist (-Xsa)
option.tip: Enable shift assist

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmult32)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer multiply instruction

option.name: 16-by-16-bit multiply(-Xmpy16)
option.tip: Enable the 16-bit by 16-bit integer multiply that produces a 32-bit result.

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmpy)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer multiply instruction

option.name: Integer divide (-Xdiv_rem)
option.tip: Enable the 32-bit integer divide instruction

option.name: Normalize instruction (-Xnorm)
option.tip: Add support for the "norm" instruction

option.name: Bit scan (includes norm) (-Xbitscan)
option.tip: Add support for the norm, ffs, and fls instructions

option.name: Swap instruction (-Xswap)
option.tip: Add support for the "swap" instruction

option.name: Code density extension (-Xcd)
option.tip: Enable instructions for improving code density.

option.name: Atomic option (-Xatomic)
option.tip: Enable the atomic option.

option.name: Use Timer 0 (-Xtimer0)
option.tip: Indicate that timer 0 is to be supported

option.name: Use timer 1 (-Xtimer1)
option.tip: Indicate that timer 1 is to be supported

option.name: Reduced Register Set (-rf16)
option.tip: Restrict register set to 16 registers

option.name: Extended arithmetic (-Xea)
option.tip: Add support for the "ea" instuction

option.name: Dual viterbi butterfly (-Xdvbf)
option.tip: Add support for the "dvbf" instuction

option.name: Variable polynomial CRC (-Xcrc)
option.tip: Add support for the "crc" instuction

option.name: 32x16 multiply instructions (-Xmul32x16)
option.tip: Add support for 32x16 multiply DSP instruction

option.name: 24x24 XMAC (-Xxmac_24)
option.tip: Add support for 24x24 XMAC DSP instruction

option.name: Dual 16x16 XMAC (-Xxmac_d16)
option.tip: Add support for dual 16x16 XMAC DSP instruction

option.name: XY Memory (-Xxy)
option.tip: Specify whether XY memory is available

option.name: Common extensions (-Xlib)
option.tip: Specify standard set of extensions

option.name: Runtime C++ library
option.tip: Specify the C++ runtime library to link against

option.name: PC register width (-Bpc_width=)
option.tip: Width of the PC register, in bits.

option.name: Barrel shifter (-Xbs)
option.tip: Enable barrel shifter

option.name: Shift Assist (-Xsa)
option.tip: Enable shift assist

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmult32)
option.tip: Mark the generated executable as having 32-bit integer multiply enabled

option.name: 16-by-16-bit multiply(-Xmpy16)
option.tip: Enable the 16-bit by 16-bit integer multiply that produces a 32-bit result.

option.name: 32-bit multiply instruction (-Xmpy)
option.tip: Mark the generated executable as having 32-bit integer multiply enabled

option.name: Integer divide (-Xdiv_rem)
option.tip: Mark the generated executable as having 32-bit integer divide enabled

option.name: Normalize instruction (-Xnorm)
option.tip: Mark the executable as requiring the "norm" extension instruction

option.name: Bit scan instructions (-Xbitscan)
option.tip: Mark the executable as requiring the "norm", "ffs", and "fls" extension instruction

option.name: Swap instruction (-Xswap)
option.tip: Mark the executable as requiring the "swap" extension instruction

option.name: Code density extension (-Xcd)
option.tip: Mark the generated executable as relying on the code density extension.

option.name: Atomic option (-Xatomic)
option.tip: Mark the generated executable as relying on the atomic option.

option.name: Reduced Register Set (-rf16)
option.tip: Link in libraries compiled with restricted register set

option.name: Harvard memory convention (-Hharvard)
option.tip: Link in runtime library compiled with separate code and data spaces

option.name: XY Memory (-Xxy)
option.tip: Specify whether XY memory is available

option.name: Target Runtime Libraries
option.tip: Specify the target runtime library based on processor

option.name: Timer for hardware profiling
option.tip: Specify the timer to be used for runtime profiling

option.name: Compact Single-precision floating point libraries (-Xspfp_compact)
option.tip: Link in runtime library compiled with compact single-precision floating point extension

option.name: Fast Single-precision floating point libraries (-Xspfp_fast)
option.tip: Link in runtime library compiled with compact single-precision floating point extension

option.name: Compact Double-precision floating point libraries (-Xdpfp_compact)
option.tip: Link in runtime library compiled with compact double-precision floating point extension

option.name: Fast Double-precision floating point libraries (-Xdpfp_fast)
option.tip: Link in runtime library compiled with fast double-precision floating point extension

option.name: Overlay support required (-Haom)
option.tip: Indicate that code being linked contains overlays

option.name: Link in AOM library (!-Haom_nolib)
option.tip: Link in the Automated Overlay Management (AOM) library

option.name: Require that all code reside in overlays (-Haom_overlay_only)
option.tip: Require that the generated executable contain overlays only.

extension.name: MetaWare C/C++ Scanner Configuration Discovery Profile

profilePage.name: MetaWare C/C++ Includes & Symbol Discovery for ARCompact
